blogs.title: The Apothecary Diaries
blogs.body:
Genre: Drama, Mystery, Historical
Status: Ongoing
Rating: 10/10

Set in the fictional country based in ancient China, the series follows the adventures of the protagonist MaoMao as she navigates the ups and downs of serving as an Imperial Servant in the Imperial Harem after being kidnapped. A turn of events soon establishes her skills as an apothecary and laady-in-waiting to one of the four high ranking concubines, contradicting her plans of living a quiet life in the palace
blogs.author: aayushi
